author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tension prevailed in J.J.Nagar and Ambedkar Nagar in Bagayam following a quarrel between two groups on Sunday night.

Police said the two groups – Muslims from J.J.Nagar and Hindus (Arunthathiyar) from Ambedkar Nagar - had gone to bathe in a water body. Suddenly there arose a quarrel over a trivial issue and it ended in a fisticuff.

Police said the Muslim youth claimed that the Hindu boys pelted stones on a mosque in the locality. Following the fisticuff, police arrested six persons from both groups.

While a group of Muslims gathered at the office of the Superintendent of Police, Vellore on Monday demanding the release of the Muslim youth, Hindu Munnani submitted a petition seeking release of the Hindu youth claiming that they were arrested based on a false complaint.
title: Tension in Bayagam
